title: Close Quarters
description: Luckily, being trapped with a bunch of depressed New Yorkers on a a rainy day on Fire Island is Nina's idea of fun. The vacation buddies are stuck in the house with one killer topic of conversation--murder. The hunt is on for the killer of the man who had organized their house share, and the prime suspect is the man showing an interest in Nina.
author: Marissa Piesman
